mapper.insert: insert into food(food_name, food_price, food_intro, file_code, food_state, diner_code) values(#{food_name}, #{food_price}, #{food_intro}, #{file_code}, #{food_state}, #{diner_code} )
mapper.update: update food set food_name=#{food_name}, food_price=#{food_price}, food_intro=#{food_intro}, file_code=#{file_code}, food_state=#{food_state} where food_code = #{food_code}
